xml.name: help-text
xml.help:
FASTG2Protlib-Peptides creates a validated protein FASTA library starting from FASTG output. The tool operates in two steps.
**Generate Peptides from FASTG**
Use the tool to generate peptides cleaved from putative proteins generated from a FASTG file.
**Generate Verified Protein Library**
Use the FASTG2Protlib-Validate tool to generate a verified protein library with MSGF+ verified peptides as input
